response.overview: A young photographer wanders the city taking pictures with a Polaroid 600 CloseUp, but on each print the silhouette of a woman on a bicycle appears. The sequence of photos makes it clear that the woman is about to be hit by a trolleybus.  Based loosely on Stephen King's novella "The Sun Dog" and Julio Cort√°zar's short story "Blow-Up" ("Las babas del diablo").
response.title: Close Up
